data.name: Rock 'N Roll Gold Heart Hero Support for Domestic Violence DLC
data.detailed_description:
Show your support for the fight against Domestic Violence by purchasing this Gold Heart Hero DLC which makes your player ship gold in color instead of the default blue!

* As a Youtube content creator who has made it my mission to both raise awareness and donations for the National Domestic Violence hotline, 100% of all earnings made from this Gold Heart Hero DLC will be donated to the American Domestic Violence hotline.

A link to the donations recipient website can be found by clicking the "View The Manual" link in blue to the right side.

A link is also provided to my Youtube video discussing my mission to raise awareness and help support the fight against domestic violence by clicking the View Stats button to the right.
